revised_title: African Medicinal Plants: Catalogue and Uses
tldr: The author, James Petiver, presents a catalogue of Guinea plants with their native names and uses. The catalogue includes descriptions of various plants and their properties, such as healing, anti-inflammatory, and anti-parasitic effects. These plants were used for treating ailments like the itch, smallpox, scurvy, and toothache, among others. The text also discusses the importance of further research into the properties of these plants for the advancement of medicine.
